segments.text: That sounds pretty good . But isn't downloading music illegal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not if you pay for it . For example , if you download from iTunes and pay with your credit card , it's legal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'm going to get iTunes and download some Vanilla Ice songs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Awesome . You'll see that they are really catchy .
segments.speaker: S2
